Class game.GameRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.GameRules

  • public class game.GameRules
extends java.lang.Object
    Validates user interactions with the game.GameBoard. Directly placing game.Pieces/Tiles onto the board will not gurantee you are following the rules. game.GameRules keeps the moves in check.
